thread.title: Free month of Premium membership with SuperBru's Rugby World Cup Predictor game
thread.title_full: Free month of Premium membership with SuperBru's Rugby World Cup Predictor game - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Free month of Premium membership with SuperBru's Rugby World Cup Predictor game
text: Telegraph readers can enjoy a free month of Premium membership with SuperBru's Rugby World Cup Predictor game. Over 900,000 people have played SuperBru games in Rugby, Football, Cricket, Golf, Tennis and Motorsport. The game is quick to join and very simple to play - predict the winner and winning margin of each fixture in the tournament, and you'll score points for accuracy. Challenge your friends and work colleagues in private leagues and compete for bragging rights and prizes. Make the Rugby World Cup even more exciting by joining SuperBru today. How to Claim: To claim your free month of Premium membership, register here and your account will be upgraded to Premium within an hour â€“ no need to enter your card details. You can also use the exclusive code TELEGRAPH50 in the SuperBru store to benefit from a 50% discount on all items. *Register before 18th September to claim your free month of premium membership. telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
